sen.j: 鶏ガラの出汁とともに、牛乳を加え、まろやかさとコクを加えるもの。

sen.e: Asukanabe is said to have originated when a monk that came to Japan from Tang during the Asuka era, made pot dish with a goat's milk in order to save himself from the cold.
